text: Valérie Debord (born 29 November 1971) was a member of the National Assembly of France. She is of Italian origin and represented the Meurthe-et-Moselle department, and was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. She lost her seat on 17 June 2012 to Socialist Hervé Féron, by 54.15% to 45.85%. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:People from Chaumont, Haute-Marne Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:French people of Italian descent Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians Category:Regional councillors of Grand Est Category:Chevaliers of the Légion d'honneur
title: Valérie Debord
